item.title: SE
item.description: score:2 Chances: Growth stock investors could be in for an excellent year in 2024. Although it’s battling intense competition, there is still much that can work in Sea’s favor. If you missed the tenfold return in Amazon stock since 2013, this other e-commerce stock might give you another chance.
